about_the_game:
This game is a car drift simulator where you can soar into the sky and rebound off walls. You earn money and level up by executing drifting maneuvers and performing flips throughout the city. The city itself is a unique playground, featuring expansive roads and limitless possibilities limited only by your imagination. It offers ample opportunities for creative exploration, including accessing rooftops with daring car jumps and inventing your own drifting routes.

El-Drifto is an independent game crafted with love and passion for cars and drifting ❤️. You can personalize your vehicle by purchasing various wheels and turbo sound options, as well as choosing its color. Each car can be visualy tuned. Also each car have is own behavior on the road.

With your in-game earnings, you can access:


8 cars🚘
20 wheels in the garage 🤩
3 different tiers of customization
3 sizes of wheels
46 distinct turbo sounds 🥵
In this game, you have the freedom to drift and jump across the hand crafted cityscape, designed to be a playground for your enjoyment. Customize your car to your liking. Drifting and performing stunts are the primary means of both earning money and advancing in levels. Remember, your sole mission in El-Drifto is to have fun. 🫶

name: EL-DRIFTO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: The game aims is to drive, and drift your car in the city. You can also jumps on the wall and to do flips. Earn money by drifting and doing flips without flipping the car on the roof. Level up and buy new wheels, turbo and cars with your money and customize your car colour for your own pleasure. ❤️
